People with pre-existing illnesses are more vulnerable to Coronavirus
Correct Answer: True, pre-existing conditions weaken your immune system and leave you compromised
Fake Answer 1: True because pre-existing conditions can cause coronavirus
Fake Answer 2: False, your immune system can fight both pre-existing conditions and covid
Fake Answer 3: False, pre-existing conditions prevent you from getting coronavirus

Questions:: Getting a flu vaccine helps you just in case, you get both the flu and Coronavirus at the same time

Fake Answer 1: False, the flu vaccine is completely ineffective

Fake Answer 3: False, the flu vaccine worsens your symptoms if you have both the coronavirus and the flu
